hero.title: Build Your Perfect Resume with AI
hero.subtitle: Create professional, ATS-friendly resumes in minutes. Powered by AI to help you stand out and land your dream job.

features.title: Everything You Need to Land the Job
features.subtitle: Powerful tools designed to make resume building effortless and effective

aiChat.title: AI-Powered Writing
aiChat.description: Chat with AI to optimize your resume content, rewrite bullet points, and tailor your experience for any role.

templates.title: Professional Templates
templates.description: Choose from a curated collection of modern, ATS-friendly templates designed by hiring experts.

dragDrop.title: Drag & Drop Editor
dragDrop.description: Easily rearrange sections, customize layouts, and build your resume exactly the way you want.

export.title: Multi-Format Export
export.description: Export your resume as PDF, Word, HTML, plain text, or JSON — ready for any application platform.

sharing.title: One-Click Sharing
sharing.description: Generate a shareable link to your resume with optional password protection and view tracking.

i18n.title: Multilingual Support
i18n.description: Create resumes in multiple languages and translate between them instantly with AI assistance.

jdMatch.title: JD Match Analysis
jdMatch.description: Paste a job description and get an instant match score with actionable suggestions to improve your resume.

translate.title: AI Translation
translate.description: Translate your entire resume between languages with one click. AI preserves professional tone and formatting.

coverLetter.title: Cover Letter Generator
coverLetter.description: Generate tailored cover letters based on your resume and the target job description — formal, friendly, or confident.

grammarCheck.title: Grammar Check
grammarCheck.description: Detect grammar errors, weak verbs, and vague descriptions. Get a writing quality score with fix suggestions.

templates.title: Beautiful Templates to Get You Started
templates.subtitle: Professionally designed templates that pass ATS systems and impress recruiters

cta.title: Ready to Build Your Best Resume?
